Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for a special election to fill vacancies in the office of United States senator from this state; repealer
Summary: Provides for a special election to fill vacancies in the office of United States senator from this state.
LawCode: Rpld ยง42 sub 4-a, amd ยง42, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to vacancies occurring in the office of United States senator and to repeal subdivision 4-a of section 42 of the public officers law relating thereto
